page.title: 19CLUBS_TANFIELD COM.ASS._
page.content: The Association was formed in 1963. There are 12 groups within the Association.They are :Playschool, Bingo,Youth Club,Ladies Club,Dress Making,Baden Powell Scouts and Baby Clinic.They hope shortly to commence a dancing class.They also send to Maiden Law Hospital for dinners to be served in the community centre.The total membership is 380.The playschool is held at the community centre itself. Bingo is on every fortnight on Tuesday while the Youth Club is held at Tanfield Comprehensive school on Monday,Tuesday and Friday.The ladies club is held on a Tuesday night.Baden Powell Scouts hold their meeting in Tanfield Lea Junior school on a Friday night.Sometimes they go on a Sunday to do badges.The baby clinic operates on a Tuesday afternoon.That is where babies go to get weighed.
